snippet: Kyle Lowry scored 32 points, Luis Scola had all of his 17 in the first quarter and the Toronto Raptors beat the Boston Celtics 105-91 on Friday night....
lead_paragraph: Kyle Lowry scored 32 points, Luis Scola had all of his 17 in the first quarter and the Toronto Raptors beat the Boston Celtics 105-91 on Friday night.

headline.main: Lowry, Raptors Send Celtics to Fourth Straight Loss
headline.print_headline: Lowry, Raptors Send Celtics to Fourth Straight Loss
